description.p: Strike: Action; Make a melee attack with the melee weapon in your main hand. (Damage: weapon damage and add modifier)

sheet.description: Action; Make a melee attack with the melee weapon in your main hand. (Damage: weapon damage and add modifier)

description.p: Shoot: Action; Make a ranged attack with the ranged weapon in your main hand. (Damage: weapon damage and add modifier)

sheet.description: Action; Make a ranged attack with the ranged weapon in your main hand. (Damage: weapon damage and add modifier)

description.p: Hilt Strike: As a Bonus Action, When wielding a single-bladed weapon in your main or off-hand, make a melee attack with the hilt of that weapon, possibly dazing them. The target must make a Constitution saving throw: DC:8 + proficiency bonus + Strength or Dexterity modifier. On a failed save, the target becomes dazed (dazed: has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws, can't take Reactions and loses the Dexterity bonus to their AC). On a successful save, the target doesn't get dazed. (Damage: 1d4 kinetic)

sheet.description: As a Bonus Action, Make a melee attack with the hilt of that weapon. On hit: 1d4 kinetic damage, target makes Constitution save (DC 8 + prof + Str/Dex mod) or becomes dazed.

description.p: Slash: Action; When wielding double bladed weapon, make a melee attack that hits in a 15 feet horizontal line in front of you. (Damage: weapon damage without adding modifiers)

sheet.description: Action; When wielding double bladed weapon, make a melee attack that hits in a 15 feet horizontal line in front of you. (Damage: weapon damage without adding modifiers)

description.p: Blast: Action; Blast multiple targets in a cone in front of you. Each target makes a Dexterity saving throw, DC 8 + proficiency bonus (if applicable) + Dexterity modifier. On a failed save, the target takes full damage. On a successful save, the target takes half damage. (Damage: Weapon Damage and add modifier)

sheet.description: Action; Blast multiple targets in a cone. Dexterity save (DC 8 + prof + Dexterity modifier). Full damage on fail, half on success. (Damage: Weapon Damage and add modifier)

description.p: Flame: Action; Flame multiple targets in a cone in front of you. Each target makes a Dexterity saving throw, DC 8 + proficiency bonus (if applicable) + Dexterity modifier. On a failed save, the target takes full damage and is inflicted burning for 2 turns. On a successful save, the target takes half damage and is inflicted burning for 1 turn. (Damage: Weapon Damage and add modifier)

sheet.description: Action; Flame multiple targets in a cone. Dexterity save (DC 8 + prof + Dexterity modifier). Full damage + burning (2 turns) on fail, half damage + burning (1 turn) on success. (Damage: Weapon Damage and add modifier)

description.p: Off-Hand Strike: Bonus Action; When dual-wielding, make a melee attack with the melee weapon in your off-hand. (Damage: weapon damage without adding modifiers)

sheet.description: Bonus Action; When dual-wielding, make a melee attack with the melee weapon in your off-hand. (Damage: weapon damage without adding modifiers)

description.p: Quick Shot: Bonus Action; When dual-wielding, make a ranged attack with the ranged weapon in your off-hand. (Damage: weapon damage without adding modifiers)

sheet.description: Bonus Action; When dual-wielding, make a ranged attack with the ranged weapon in your off-hand. (Damage: weapon damage without adding modifiers)

description.p: Back Strike: As a Bonus Action, Make a melee attack with the other side of your weapon. On hit: weapon damage without adding modifiers.

sheet.description: As a Bonus Action, Make a melee attack with the other side of your weapon. On hit: weapon damage without adding modifiers.

description.p: Dart: As an Action, Shoot a Dart with the weapon at a target. On hit: Damage and conditions depend on the dart.

sheet.description: As an Action, Shoot a Dart with the weapon. On hit: Damage and conditions depend on the dart.

description.p: As an Action, Shoot a Dart with the stealth pistol at a target. On hit: Damage and conditions depend on the dart.

sheet.description: As an Action, Shoot a Dart with the stealth pistol. On hit: Damage and conditions depend on the dart.

description.p: Rocket: As an Action, Shoot a Rocket with the weapon at a target. On hit: Damage and conditions depend on the rocket.

sheet.description: As an Action, Shoot a Rocket with the weapon. On hit: Damage and conditions depend on the rocket.

description.p: Whip: Action; Use the fiber cord whip attachment. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 + proficiency bonus + your Dexterity modifier). On a failed save, the target is restrained. While restrained, the target can use an action on their turn to make a Strength saving throw (DC 8 + proficiency bonus + your Strength modifier). On a failed save, they remain restrained. On a successful save, they are freed. You can't use bonus actions or hold something in that hand while restraining someone.

sheet.description: Action: Use the whip attachment to restrain a target.

description.p: Reload: Action; After x amount of shots your weapon needs a reload, take a full Action to fully reload your weapon.

sheet.description: Action; After x amount of shots your weapon needs a reload, take a full Action to fully reload your weapon.

p.em: 1d6 energy, power cell, range 50/200, Reload 16, Dexterity modifier

description.p: This standard sidearm fires concentrated energy bolts. It uses power cells and has a high capacity.
• Shoot: Action; Make a ranged attack with the ranged weapon in your main hand. (Damage: weapon damage and add modifier)
• Quick Shot: Bonus Action; When dual-wielding, make a ranged attack with the ranged weapon in your off-hand. (Damage: weapon damage without adding modifiers)

• Shoot: Action; Make a ranged attack with the ranged weapon in your main hand. (Damage: weapon damage and add modifier)
The iconic weapon of the Jedi and Sith, a lightsaber projects a blade of pure plasma energy. It uses the Force to ignite and can be wielded with exceptional precision.
• Strike: Action; Make a melee attack with the melee weapon in your main hand. (Damage: weapon damage and add modifier)
• Off-Hand Strike: Bonus Action; When dual-wielding, make a melee attack with the melee weapon in your off-hand. (Damage: weapon damage without adding modifiers)
• Hilt Strike: Bonus Action; When wielding a single-bladed weapon in your main or off-hand, make a melee attack with the hilt of that weapon, possibly dazing them. (Damage: 1d4 kinetic)
A training lightsaber designed for Jedi initiates, this weapon projects a shorter plasma blade and is easier to handle than a full lightsaber.
• Strike: Action; Make a melee attack with the melee weapon in your main hand. (Damage: weapon damage and add modifier)
• Off-Hand Strike: Bonus Action; When dual-wielding, make a melee attack with the melee weapon in your off-hand. (Damage: weapon damage without adding modifiers)
• Hilt Strike: Bonus Action; When wielding a single-bladed weapon in your main or off-hand, make a melee attack with the hilt of that weapon, possibly dazing them. (Damage: 1d4 kinetic)

p.em: 2d6 energy damage, two-handed, requires Dexterity 13 to use, Strength modifier

description.p: This unique lightsaber design features a crossguard of plasma blades that protect the wielder's hands. It requires exceptional dexterity to use safely. Requires Dexterity 13 to use.
• Strike: Action; Make a melee attack with the melee weapon in your main hand. (Damage: weapon damage and add modifier)
• Hilt Strike: Bonus Action; When wielding a single-bladed weapon in your main or off-hand, make a melee attack with the hilt of that weapon, possibly dazing them. (Damage: 1d4 kinetic)
This exotic weapon consists of a handle that projects a flexible plasma whip. It can strike at enemies up to 10 feet away and requires great skill to wield effectively.
• Strike: Action; Make a melee attack with the melee weapon in your main hand. (Damage: weapon damage and add modifier)
• Off-Hand Strike: Bonus Action; When dual-wielding, make a melee attack with the melee weapon in your off-hand. (Damage: weapon damage without adding modifiers)
A more powerful lightsaber design used by skilled Force users. It can be wielded with one or two hands for increased damage.
• Strike: Action; Make a melee attack with the melee weapon in your main hand. (Damage: weapon damage and add modifier)
• Off-Hand Strike: Bonus Action; When dual-wielding, make a melee attack with the melee weapon in your off-hand. (Damage: weapon damage without adding modifiers)
• Hilt Strike: Bonus Action; When wielding a single-bladed weapon in your main or off-hand, make a melee attack with the hilt of that weapon, possibly dazing them. (Damage: 1d4 kinetic)

p.em: 1d10 energy, two-handed, reach: 10 feet, requires Dexterity 11 to use, Strength modifier

description.p: This extended lightsaber design provides superior reach in combat. It requires good dexterity to handle the longer weapon effectively. Requires Dexterity 11 to use.
• Strike: Action; Make a melee attack with the melee weapon in your main hand. (Damage: weapon damage and add modifier)
• Hilt Strike: Bonus Action; When wielding a single-bladed weapon in your main or off-hand, make a melee attack with the hilt of that weapon, possibly dazing them. (Damage: 1d4 kinetic)
This deadly weapon features plasma blades extending from both ends of the hilt. It requires exceptional skill to wield safely and effectively.
• Strike: Action; Make a melee attack with the melee weapon in your main hand. (Damage: weapon damage and add modifier)
• Slash: Action; When wielding double bladed weapon, make a melee attack that hits in a 15 feet horizontal line in front of you. (Damage: weapon damage without adding modifiers)
• Back Strike: Bonus Action; When wielding a double bladed weapon, make a melee attack with the other side of your weapon. (Damage: weapon damage without adding modifiers)

Rocket Launcher
Martial Blaster
Range 100/350, Reload 1, requires Strength 13 to use, two-handed
A heavy rocket launcher that fires explosive rockets at targets. Requires Strength 13 to use.
Actions:
• Rocket: As an Action, Shoot a Rocket with the rocket launcher at a target. On hit: Damage and conditions depend on the rocket.
